title: Trx3
author: Trx3
created_time: September 21, 2022, 10:42:43 AMLast edit: September 21, 2022, 11:30:56 AM by Trx3
content: Crypto miners are in panic mode right now, no coin is profitable at the moment but I am still crazy enough to build my first ever Nvidia mining rig today, still four graphic cards onboard but will add two later, mixed with Ti and Super 1660, I got the card for 120$ each and since free electricity is here I believe in few months many will leave the mining space and things will cool off again. https://i.imgur.com/V6VJAhv.jpeghttps://i.imgur.com/Uh0bfC5.jpgI know many will talk Sh** about this decision of mine but man its been fun.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Trx3 on September 21, 2022, 10:42:43 AMCrypto miners are in panic mode right now, no coin is profitable at the moment but I am still crazy enough to build my first ever Nvidia mining rig today, still four graphic cards onboard but will add two later, mixed with Ti and Super 1660, I got the card for 120$ each and since free electricity is here I believe in few months many will leave the mining space and things will cool off again. I know many will talk Sh** about this decision of mine but man its been fun. With such a profit, you will not earn much money even on free electricity. Even if the profit grows to 40 cents from your video card, it is still very little to earn. But I'm not sure that in 2 months the situation will change a lot.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: I am also expecting ETC mining difficulty to have dropped but honestly miners are behaving stubborn this time around, no one seem to be selling off their graphic cards, for what reasons? ðŸ˜‚ we cant all be here proving stubborn, some have to leave and some have to wait, OP you are crazy, I won't dare buy any gpu at this time, maybe when 30MH starts giving 1$ per card though.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Model Antminer E9 (2.4Gh) from Bitmain mining EtHash algorithm with a maximum hashrate of 2.4Gh/s for a power consumption of 1920W.https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/bitmain/antminer-e9-2-4ghModel X4 from Jasminer mining EtHash algorithm with a maximum hashrate of 2.5Gh/s for a power consumption of 1200W.https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/jasminer/x4Model V1 Classic from iPollo mining EtHash algorithm with a maximum hashrate of 1.55Gh/s for a power consumption of 1240W.https://www.asicminervalue.com/miners/ipollo/v1-classicI can write 10 ASIC models, but video cards have no opportunities to compete with ASICs on this algorithm.

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: You're brave enough to invest in such dark timesÂ  I don't know how you guys get free electricity, but if it's free, you'll always be in profitSoon or later hashrate will reduce if prices don't rise (for ETC, ERGO, RVN, ETHW etc) and you can benefit, but again, with no costs of electricity, you're ahead of 99% of another minersHow much are you earning per day?

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: rdluffy on September 21, 2022, 12:03:31 PMYou're brave enough to invest in such dark times Â I don't know how you guys get free electricity, but if it's free, you'll always be in profitSoon or later hashrate will reduce if prices don't rise (for ETC, ERGO, RVN, ETHW etc) and you can benefit, but again, with no costs of electricity, you're ahead of 99% of another minersHow much are you earning per day?An investment of $600 is more like a hobby.NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 GPU profit is super when mining ethereum classic 8 cents with free electricity, although there are other coins where the profit is 14 cents.https://whattomine.com/gpus/53-nvidia-geforce-gtx-1660-super?cost=0.1&cost_currency=USD

comments.author: MidNite36
comments.body: Where did you get your gut from newbie? This is the time to start DCA into good projects in the crypto space not buying graphic cards, its going to take years to get back your money, anyway it's your money and your risk but it's still a bad idea.

This is the time to start DCA into good projects in the crypto space not buying graphic cards, its going to take years to get back your money, anyway it's your money and your risk but it's still a bad idea.Some miners like him keeps mining to accumulate coins to sell in a bull marketI don't follow this strategy because I don't have money to pay electricity for months or years, but he has no costsJust an example, I stopped to mine in 2018.If I hadn't stopped mining, I would be rich in the peak of 2021GPUs are a hedge

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: rdluffy on September 22, 2022, 10:35:30 AMQuote from: FP91G on September 21, 2022, 12:08:11 PMAn investment of $600 is more like a hobby.NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 GPU profit is super when mining ethereum classic 8 cents with free electricity, although there are other coins where the profit is 14 cents.https://whattomine.com/gpus/53-nvidia-geforce-gtx-1660-super?cost=0.1&cost_currency=USDYou're talking about 8 cents, okWith free electricity Â We're doomed Â Because Ethereum Classic mines a lot of ASICs, and it will take a long time to try to accumulate this coin with such a profit. comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: It is not sh*t at all,even with a huge energy price you still can do "well" in the sense that just 300 watt is for four cards plus the motherboard and that is like 210 kilowatt monthly which is not a big number despite having high energy but luckily for you the energy is free.The only downside many would say is that is not profitable at the moment and that is true however now is the golden time to collect the coins you like mining as the difficulty will cool down more because many miners will shut off their operations in the couple of months that are coming,in 2023 maybe we will be in bear market but that is where money is made,oh and one last thing,only bold individuals who have enough guts to keep mining at this time will make the money for the next bull run.
